snippet: Timothy F. Geithner urged Congress to pass the Obama administration’s jobs plan, warning that a failure to act would result in tax increases for families and businesses.
lead_paragraph: Timothy F. Geithner urged Congress to pass the Obama administration’s jobs plan, warning that a failure to act would result in tax increases for families and businesses.

headline.main: Treasury Secretary Urges Quick Action on Jobs Plan
headline.print_headline: Treasury Secretary Urges Quick Action on Jobs Plan
headline.seo: Geithner Urges Quick Action on Jobs Plan
